attributes.action: order a review into the emergency planning surrouding the February snow storm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Order a review and consider

If local authorities are doing enouch compared to how much the Snow costs the country

putting more responsibility on others ie use of plant hire companies for snow clerance

Making it a strong suggestion that every vehicle should carry snow chains during winter or at least public transport and other key vehicles, snowploughs for trains.

Allow workers not to be peanised if they choose to stay at home during snow
